Perfect for Notion, GitHub, Twitter, and other social platforms, ideal for team collaboration and personal branding. Try it now and easily create your own Notion-style avatar!

steps.title: How to Use
steps.step1Desc: Select from various preset styles to find your preferred avatar type
steps.step2Desc: Adjust hairstyle, facial features, accessories, and other details to create a unique look

steps.step4Desc: Share your new Notion Avatar on social media and show it off to your friends!

faq.title: FAQ
faq.whatIsAvatarAnswer: Notion Avatar Maker is a free tool that allows you to create custom avatars for use in Notion, social media, or any other digital platform.
faq.howToUse: How do I use the avatar editor?
faq.howToUseAnswer: Simply click on the different facial features, hairstyles, and accessories to customize your avatar. Use the flip button to change orientation and the background button to adjust the background style.
faq.commercialUse: Can I use avatars for commercial purposes?
faq.commercialUseAnswer: Yes, all avatars created with Notion Avatar are released under the CC0 license, allowing commercial use without attribution.
faq.privacyConcerns: Do you collect any user data?
faq.privacyConcernsAnswer: No, we do not collect or store any user data. All avatar creation happens locally in your browser.
faq.supportedBrowsersAnswer: Notion Avatar works best on modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. Internet Explorer is not supported.
faq.isBelongToNotion: Is Notion Avatar Maker affiliated with Notion?
faq.isBelongToNotionAnswer: No, Notion Avatar Maker is not affiliated with Notion. It is an independent project.

steps.step3Desc: Click generate and AI will create your avatar in seconds
steps.step4Desc: Download your generated avatar and use it on Notion, social media, and more

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does AI generation take?
faq.a1: Usually just a few seconds. AI processes your request in the background and you can download once it's complete.
faq.q2: How many generations can free users make per day?
faq.a2: Free users can generate 1 avatar per day. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited generations.
faq.q3: How do I upgrade to Pro?
faq.a3: Click the 'Upgrade Now' button on the page, choose Pro Monthly subscription or Credit Pack, complete payment to enjoy more features.
faq.q4: Can I use generated avatars commercially?
faq.a4: Yes, all generated avatars follow CC0 license and can be used for commercial purposes without attribution.
